briefdescription.para: ui
MainWindow: Construct a window.
MainWindow::getCurrentCustomerId get the selected customer.
MainWindow::getCurrentProjectId get the selected project id.
MainWindow::getCurrentQuoteId get the selected quote id.
MainWindow::getCurrentCustomerName get the selected customer name in the customers' table.
MainWindow::getCurrentProjectName get the selected project name in the table of projects.
MainWindow::treeLevel return the level of the node selected in the tree.

simplesect.para: integer, depth of the item in tree

briefdescription.para: MainWindow::rootTree return the root of the tree "Tous les clients".
MainWindow::addDoc open window to add a new document.
MainWindow::addCustomer open window to add a new customer.
MainWindow::editCustomer open window to modify a customer.
MainWindow::removeCustomer open a popup to confirm the deletion of a customer, if ok remove the customer.
MainWindow::addQuote open window to add a new quote.
MainWindow::addBill open window to add a new bill.
MainWindow::billingIsPaid Define the current billing as "paid".
MainWindow::editUser modify the user.
MainWindow::search launch a new search.
MainWindow::addProject Create a new project for a customer.
MainWindow::removeProject Remove a project for a customer.
MainWindow::editProject Modify the customer project.
MainWindow::aboutQt show Qt's details.
MainWindow::aboutFact show FACT's details (FACT team)
MainWindow::aboutFactDev() show FactDev's details (FactDev Software)
MainWindow::aboutIcons() show icons's details.
updateButton Update all button to disable or enabled its
MainWindow::editDoc Edit the quote or bill of the project.
MainWindow::removeDoc Remove the quote or bill of the project.
MainWindow::editQuote Edit the qupte or.
MainWindow::openContextualMenuTable open contextual menu on right click, on table.
MainWindow::openContextualMenuTree open contextual menu on right click, on tree.
MainWindow::changeCustomerTree call changeCustomerTree.
MainWindow::changeCustomerTable function to update the view when we change the selected customer in tblCustomers.
MainWindow::changeProjectsTable function to update the view when we change the selected project in tblProjects.
MainWindow::changeDocsTable function to update the view when we change the selected doc in tblQuotes.
MainWindow::customersTableToProjectsTable changes projects with the index of the customer in table of customers.
MainWindow::backToCustomersTable displays the customers table.
MainWindow::backToProjectsTable displays the projects table.
MainWindow::projectsTableToDocsTable displays quotes of a project with the index of the project in the table of projects.
MainWindow::findParent return the parent of an item in tree.
MainWindow::updateUI Update all components of the MainWindow
MainWindow::updateTable Update the table view (just client in the first version)

parameterdescription.para: optional parameter for select the row in table

briefdescription.para: MainWindow::updateTableProjects Update the table of projects view.

parameterdescription.para: Only projects corresponding with the filter are selected
optional parameter for select the row in table

briefdescription.para: MainWindow::updateTree Update the tree view (just client in the first version)
MainWindow::updateUser Update user data panel.
MainWindow::updateTableBillings Update the table of billings view.

parameterdescription.para: Only billings corresponding to the idProject
optional parameter for select the row in table

briefdescription.para: MainWindow::removeItem Remove the item selected in the table tbl

parameterdescription.para: an item in the table tbl

briefdescription.para: MainWindow::getCurrentTableId Get the ID of the item selected in the tableview tbl
The MainWindow class Main Window of the software.
